name: Art slave
description:
Pocket hallucinations is a Triptych of animated collages for which I composed some small musical pieces for Harpsichord.
The story that runs through these scenes, is from when I was kidnapped by the Schizoid Bunnies.
A few words about the 2nd part:

II. Art slave

The first thing I saw when they took off my bandage
was an ancient musical instrument.
The Guardian said "you'd better get to work".
After the door slammed, the lock rattled.
In the bedroom were more instruments, brushes and paper,
but my eyes were on the keyboard.
Pointedly at his broken tooth.
I stood motionless until it was dark.
This place was undoubtedly better than the dungeon.
There was no shortage of little luxuries in the ashtray.
I was overcome with nostalgia and shed a few tears on the keys.
Then the instrument gave me a melody.
Through its metallic sound, it sang compassion.
Something united us,
beyond the chain.
